content: #8584 seems to be growing a lot of a dependent PRs by myself, @Junyan Xu, and @Jujian Zhang; it would be great if someone could take a look before this tree grows further.

Eric Wieser said:

#8584 seems to be growing a lot of a dependent PRs by myself, Junyan Xu, and Jujian Zhang; it would be great if someone could take a look before this tree grows further.

it looks good to me.
I'm rather worried about the implications of Junyan's PR (I assume you meant #8638), and would rather see the less worrying bits merged first

Also, merging #8584 means that I can work on the performance issues in #8519, while presumably unblocking you on some other things; after all, you said that liftAddHom was really the thing you needed.

I had a look at #8638. I don't see why tensor product over noncommutative rings should be treated distinctly from the case of commutative rings. They're exactly the same stuff though in the commutative case, some things simplify, but not at the level of definitions, only for theorems.
My impression is that the description of #8638 doesn't match the patch (your objection seems to be aimed at the former), and so it really is "draft" as labelled!
@Jujian Zhang, @Junyan Xu: you can merge #8519 into your derived branches to resolve the conflicts
